original_title: Two arrested for running unregistered rehabilitation center in Dehiwala
original_body_lines: The Dehiwala Police have arrested two persons for operating an unregistered rehabilitation center at Malwatta in Dehiwala yesterday.

Police said the rehabilitation center was raided based on information received by the Dehiwala police that a center for rehabilitation of drug addicts was being run without being registered with the Dangerous Drugs Control Board.
A man who was operating the center and another who was assisting him were arrested.
Police said 34 persons who were undergoing rehabilitation are detained at the police station for security.
The arrested suspects are 50 and 51 years old from Dehiwala and Borella.
